entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: W 26 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
